text: Iznassen Berber or Taznasst (Berber : ⵜⴰⵣⵏⴰⵙⵙⵜ, Arabic : الزناسية or الزناسنية) is the original rifian berber dialect of the Yat Iznassen, an Arabized berber tribe of the Rif, etablished before the border between Algeria and Morocco. The Arabic language is now predominant in the Iznassen tribe. Category:Languages of Morocco Category:Berber languages
title: Iznasen Berber
